title: Lag spikes at 19 ping starting today
body:
Starting today, I've been have unplayable lag spikes, while my ping never changes throughout the game. The game will literally stop everything but my characters animations for 10 seconds and then refresh. The game also kicked me out with a 30 second lag spike and disconnect right as we won.

so DO NOT say your server status is fine. It is NOT.

replies.body:
I just had this happen to me as well, latency showing 22 ms so no problem, but absolutely unplayable lag spikes. Abilities taking 30s sometimes to fire off, message in chat appearing 90s after I sent them, minions are stuck attacking each other or getting hit by tower and taking no damage/not moving/stuck in base. Completely unplayable and unfortunate instant loss for my team.

I'm on a wireless connection and I restarted my router and my PC, both to no avail. I had nothing running in the background at all either so I don't know what else to do on my side.

Here is an image of logs from a bot game I tried afterwards just to see if the problem persisted:

[](http://imgur.com/SJAmyvK)
http://imgur.com/SJAmyvK

It doesn't look like we've been having any major NA server issues recently. The way you described your champion stopping for about 10 seconds then everything rushing to catch up really sounds like some packet loss problems. take the network logs from that game, pop them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) so that it can scan them to see just what was going on with your connection in that match.

I posted about this about a week ago but was completely ignored. The game is unplayable for me, and I never had an lag issues until recently. Nothing has changed on my end, and I still don't have any lag issues with any other game. I gave up playing and tried again tonight, but there is no change.
